text: Dora May Broadbent OBE, better known as Dora Bryan (7 February 1923 â€“ 23 July 2014) was an English actress of stage, movie and television.The Argus, 2 September 2013: Feted Brighton actress Dora, 90, to make rare public appearance, linked 6 September 2013. She was known for her roles in A Taste of Honey and in Last of the Summer Wine. She died on 23 July 2014 at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Dora Bryan's appearance on This Is Your Life * Dora Bryan exhibition at Grange Museum, Rottingdean Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Lancashire
title: Dora Bryan
